description: Currently developing Fenzo using Next.js & TailwindCSS, an e-commerce website focused on wedding decorations and rentals.
Delivered multiple client projects using modern web technologies, maintaining top-tier performance, accessibility, and responsiveness across devices.

Built a mini ERP system using React.js, based on the Fuse React Template , to ensure a scalable and professional structure. Implemented a role- and permission-based access system (SuperAdmin, Admins, Company Users) and integrated key third-party libraries such as Google Maps, Zod, and others.
Developed an educational platform for English language learning, designed for both students and teachers to interact and manage learning materials.
Collaborated closely with backend developers to integrate well-structured REST APIs and ensure seamless data flow.
Worked with UI/UX designers to implement responsive, user-friendly, and accessible interfaces.
Wrote clean, optimized, and maintainable code under the guidance of an experienced team leader, following best practices and coding standards.
Ensured security best practices and data protection across the application stack.
Built Vela, a private chat application for companies using React.js and MUI, featuring to-do lists, event management, and video/voice calling.
Developed an interactive dashboard for a gas station using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, improving data visibility and operational efficiency.
Enhanced and maintained features across multiple platforms using React.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Designed and optimized layouts to improve usability, performance, and user experience.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and implemented fully responsive designs for all supported devices.
Converted native applications into mobile-friendly, responsive web interfaces, improving accessibility and user reach.
